creditline: Gift of Emily and Mark Goldstein
description: "In Memories of" mural with portraits of a couple ("Mr. & Mrs. Smith"); "Sister" under woman, "Pimp" under man; thought balloon over woman's head with picture of a stove; thought balloon over man's head with picture of a taxi ("#17")
inscription: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Label
markings: on back, Weinstein Gallery label; on back, on label, in black ink: [Shotgun Lounge, Greenville, MS  edition 1/5  2006 / Alec Soth]
title: Shotgun Lounge, Greenville, Mississippi
